apis.name: List environments
apis.description: Get all environments for a given project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Return the environment with this name. Mutually exclusive with search

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Return list of environments matching the search criteria. Mutually exclusive with name

attributes.name: states
attributes.description: List all environments that match a specific state. Accepted values: available or stopped. If no state value given, returns all environments.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: environment_id
attributes.description: The ID of the environment

apis.name: Create a new environment
apis.description: It returns 201 if the environment was successfully created, 400 for wrong parameters.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the environment

attributes.name: external_url
attributes.description: Place to link to for this environment

apis.name: Edit an existing environment
apis.description: It returns 200 if the environment was successfully updated. In case of an error, a status code 400 is returned.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: environment_id
attributes.description: The ID of the environment

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Deprecated and will be removed in GitLab 15.0

attributes.name: external_url
attributes.description: The new external_url

apis.name: Delete an environment
apis.description: It returns 204 if the environment was successfully deleted, and 404 if the environment does not exist.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: environment_id
attributes.description: The ID of the environment

apis.name: Delete multiple stopped review apps
apis.description: It schedules for deletion multiple environments that have already been stopped and are in the review app folder. The actual deletion is performed after 1 week from the time of execution.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: before
attributes.description: The date before which environments can be deleted. Defaults to 30 days ago. Expected in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

attributes.name: limit
attributes.description: Maximum number of environments to delete. Defaults to 100.

attributes.name: dry_run
attributes.description: Defaults to true for safety reasons. It performs a dry run where no actual deletion will be performed. Set to false to actually delete the environment.

apis.name: Stop an environment
apis.description: It returns 200 if the environment was successfully stopped, and 404 if the environment does not exist.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: environment_id
attributes.description: The ID of the environment
